oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: True Guitar Fire Orchestra (Apr. 14)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Kevin, 1970-; Woodcuts (prints); Musical instruments; Guitar;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and yellow on brown) announcing the True Fire Guitar Orchestra featuring Eric Alm, Gary Brown, Chris Burke, Alex Cavitt, John Celestian, Ed Elliot, Conor Flynn, Glen Gervais, Ali Hasbach, Anna Hinkley, Nick Hinkley, Charles Kard, Tom Kimler, Stuart Lipman, Randy Marcus, Allen Mowry, Dale Nelson, Leslie Newton, Rob Newton, Rob Pastore, Bill Pipes, Ryan Poole, Larry Robinson, Michael Shrader, Kevin Smith, Brian Vanek, Keith Watson, Brad Wenkos, and Judith York at Cafe Adagio on April 14. Poster features woodcuts of a guitar and a sun.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jenny Gill;
